com.esri.mo2.map.dpy
Interface FeatureSelectionListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
FeatureSelectionAdapter
public interface FeatureSelectionListener
extends EventListener

An interface for objects that request to be notified when features are selected on feature layer.

See Also:
FeatureSelectionEvent

Method Summary
 void cleared(FeatureSelectionEvent e)
          Invoked when a feature is cleared from the feature layer.
 void selected(FeatureSelectionEvent e)
          Invoked when a new feature is added to feature layer.
